yaml_deprecated.title: Sony projector YAML configuration is deprecated
yaml_deprecated.description: Sony Projector now uses config entries. Remove the `sony_projector` YAML from configuration.yaml and configure the integration from Settings → Devices & Services.

legacy_switch_present.title: Legacy switch is used in automations
legacy_switch_present.description:
A temporary compatibility switch {switch_entity_id} is available to keep existing automations working. Update your automations, scripts, and scenes to use the projector media player entity with the `media_player.turn_on` and `media_player.turn_off` actions.

This notice disappears automatically after a reload or restart when no automations, scripts, scenes, or groups reference the legacy switch. To re-check immediately, reload the Sony Projector integration from Settings → Devices & Services. Use Settings → Developer tools → Search to find related automations, scripts, scenes, and groups.
